name: Worm Pass
description:
Worm Pass

This game was created as a submission to the Mix and Game Jam. They challenged us to recreate a favorite mechanic of ours, but in a different dimensional perspective. Snake Pass is a 3d Platformer where you crawl around like a snake, winding through bamboo and buildings. I wanted to give that a try here on my favorite engine, Pico 8, minus one dimension.

In this game you take control of a pink linear hero, Wurm, and must escape an underground labyrinth. Control his head with the arrow keys and boost with Z when you need an extra kick. Squirm and wriggle around tight corners and ridges, thrash and slam, whatever it takes!

Thanks to NeHe Gamedev for the great tutorial on rope physics. This project was 5 hours game, and 12 hours physics engine. I really appreciate the expertise. You can find them here http://nehe.gamedev.net/tutorial/rope_physics/17006/.

Note: This game was designed to be very difficult, I wish you the best of luck!
